alert.note: Alert for Carver; Dakota; Hennepin (Minnesota) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: Special Weather Statement issued July 19 at 9:21PM CDT by NWS Minneapolis
info.description: ...A strong thunderstorm will impact portions of southeastern Hennepin, northwestern Dakota and eastern Carver Counties through 945 PM CDT... At 919 PM CDT, National Weather Service employees reported a strong thunderstorm over Chanhassen at the National Weather Service office, or 14 miles southwest of Minneapolis, moving east at 50 mph. HAZARD...Winds in excess of 30 mph. SOURCE...National Weather Service Meteorologists. IMPACT...Gusty winds could knock down tree limbs and blow around unsecured objects. This strong thunderstorm will be near... Savage and Hopkins around 925 PM CDT. Burnsville and Edina around 930 PM CDT. Richfield and MSP International Airport around 935 PM CDT. Bloomington and Apple Valley around 940 PM CDT. Eagan around 945 PM CDT. Other locations impacted by this storm include Flying Cloud Airport, Mall Of America, Fort Snelling State Park and Shorewood. MAX HAIL SIZE...0.00 IN MAX WIND GUST...30 MPH
